meanings.definition: Aulas (noun): plural form of aula, meaning a large room or hall used for lectures or meetings.
meanings.sent1: In the school, the aulas were filled with students eager to learn.
meanings.sent2: The conference was held in one of the aulas of the university.
meanings.sent3: During the meeting, the aulas echoed with laughter and discussions.
meanings.sent4: The aulas of the ancient castle whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The aulas were so spacious that they could accommodate hundreds of people.

meanings.definition: Aulas (verb): third person singular present form of aular, meaning to rent or lease out a property.
meanings.sent1: He aulas his apartment to tenants looking for a place to stay.
meanings.sent2: She aulas her vacation home during the summer months.
meanings.sent3: The landlord decided to aulas the house to a young couple starting a new life.
meanings.sent4: The real estate agent aulas properties in the city center.
meanings.sent5: They aulas their beach house to tourists visiting the coastal town.
